about.title: About Me
about.bio: I am a passionate software engineer with a focus on building scalable and user-centric applications. With expertise in modern web technologies, I love solving complex problems and delivering high-quality solutions.
about.bio2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or enjoying a good cup of coffee.
